100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗

to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
cooperative/workers' or agricultural producers' cooperative etc
to join forces/to give full cooperation
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation (MOFTEC)
pinyin: Dui4 wai4 Mao4 yi4 Jing1 ji4 He2 zuo4 bu4

definition: South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation (SAARC)
pinyin: Nan2 Ya4 Qu1 yu4 He2 zuo4 Lian2 meng2

sentences.english: The national leaders have approved the strategy of "promote economy cooperation around Beibu Gulf".
sentences.chinese: 廣西北部灣經濟區在泛北經濟合作中具有戰略地位。

sentences.english: MKCCC and Good Shepherd Community Church agreed to co-operate on building project.
sentences.chinese: 美堅堂與善牧堂正式簽署建堂合作計劃。

sentences.english: Use the concept map to promote dialogue and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 運用概念圖，促進對話與合作。

sentences.english: Steven Kennard:What are the requirements for ABP choosing international partners?
sentences.chinese: 總部基地在全球選擇合作伙伴都有哪些要求？

sentences.english: This paper explored the determinants of the port collusion by constructing two game models.
sentences.chinese: 從博奕分析角度對港口合作條件進行了研究。

sentences.english: He said to further enhance friendship, deepen understanding, deepen bilateral cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 他表示要進一步增進友誼，加深理解，深化雙方合作。

sentences.english: The return of the Milu deer is a good example of friendship and cooperation between China and Britain.
sentences.chinese: 麋鹿迴歸是中英兩國友誼和合作的一個很好的例子。

sentences.english: Inter-group cooperation is the engine of real progress at the grassroots.
sentences.chinese: 在基層民衆中，組織內部的合作更是真正進步的動力。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope of fully cooper-ate with old and new cutomers. to achieve mutual progress.
sentences.chinese: 同時誠望與各新老客戶通力合作，共同拓展。

sentences.english: Gibson has interviewed people to understand how they  conceptualize teams.
sentences.chinese: 吉布森調查了人們對於“團隊合作”這一概念的認識。

sentences.english: These cooperative enterprises will eventually be turned into joint stock companies.
sentences.chinese: 農村股份合作企業發展的方向是股份制。

sentences.english: Like the SDGs themselves, cooperatives are people-centred.
sentences.chinese: 合作社與可持續發展目標一樣，也是以人爲本。

sentences.english: Voll says cooperating in education is fundamental to better relations between the U.S. and the Muslim world.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾說，教育合作是美國改善與穆斯林關係的基礎。

sentences.english: Act towards people to deal with affairs mature and responsible, the ability is good to cooperate with others.
sentences.chinese: 待人處事成熟穩重，能很好的與他人合作。

sentences.english: Suprun's project was done in collaboration with Germany's Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 蘇普倫的研究項目是同德國紅十字會合作完成的。

sentences.english: He invited me to play it with the band.
sentences.chinese: 他邀請我吹奏薩克斯管，和樂隊合作。

definition: to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
lit. to join hands/to act together
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
to sign a contract or agreement
profitable to both sides/a win-win situation
to set foot in/to step into/to become involved for the first time
